title: Kyoto Animation: Hana-hen (Flower)
synopsis: In a vast and tranquil field, a rowdy group of children rush in with bright intentions. Armed with an array of gardening tools, packets of soil, trays of flowers, and a lively attitude to boot, the group sets upon a barren patch to begin their project.
related_anime: ['Kyoto Animation: Hassou-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Hoshi-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Ikitaku Naru Omise-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Ajisai-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Meiji-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Sora-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Suiei-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Kasa-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Souzou-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Megane-hen']
